item.title: @PlayOverwatch: Update on Overwatch Loot Boxes\xf0\x9f\x93\x86 Loot Box sales end Aug. 30\xe2\x9c\xa8 You can still earn standard Loot Boxes by playing and leveling up\xf0\x9f\x8e\x81 All remaining unopened loot boxes will automatically open upon login after Sep. 14\xf0\x9f\x91\x80
item.description:
Update on Overwatch Loot Boxes

\xf0\x9f\x93\x86 Loot Box sales end Aug. 30

\xe2\x9c\xa8 You can still earn standard Loot Boxes by playing and leveling up

\xf0\x9f\x8e\x81 All remaining unopened loot boxes will automatically open upon login after Sep. 14
